column2: *Someone - apparently, one of the scientists - is sittng on the ground and trying to do something with his radio.*
Calm down! Quiet! We've come to save you. Yeah… Come on, calm down. What were you doing here?
Can't you see? Trying to fix my radio!
*The respectable-looking scientist with a gray beard lets out a dirty curse.*
Right. I see. Well, we've found everyone. Come on, grab a sidearm, we're moving out to the colony.
